Message: The following variables form a dependency cycle: [i[0]; j[0]; i[0]]

ExtraErrors.Text: The following variables form a cycle: [i[0]; j[0]; i[0]]

Message: Variable written to after it is read

ExtraErrors.Text: The following variables are read and then updated: j This creates undefined behaviour in an always_comb block, please make sure to not update a variable after it is read.
